description
Feel like Dan from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi top with training gear! Can you compare to my art of fighting!? Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Dan de Street Fighter IV avec ce haut de kimono alternatif avec des protections ! Pour aiguiser l'art du combat ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen oberen Teil eines Gis wie Dan aus Street Fighter IV! Niemand kann sich mit deinem Kampfstil messen! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Diventa Dan di Street Fighter IV con la parte sopra di questo kimono alternativo con accessori da addestramento! Puoi competere con il mio stile di combattimento!? Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte la parte superior de este quimono alternativo y siéntete como Dan de Street Fighter IV! ¿Podrán compararse a tu estilo de lucha? Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 ダンになりきることができるアレンジ ver.のガード付き道着 （上） うらうらうらうらうらうらぁ！ Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 단이 되는 어렌지 ver. 도복(상의). 우와와와와와와아! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Feel like Dan from Street Fighter IV with this alternate gi top with training gear! Can you compare to my art of fighting!? Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
